profile:
Interior Painting
We understand that we are guests in your house. The utmost respect is paid to maintaining an environment that is as safe and clean as possible.

Preparation
We use clean plastic drop sheets on all furniture.
Durable canvas drop sheets cover the floor.
During sanding, plastic sheets will be taped over entrances to contain the dust.
If requested by customer, all holes and cracks are filled and feather sanded to ensure all edges are smoothed.
Finish Coat

Top grade paints are applied to ensure quality and a job that is washable and durable.
All cut lines and edging are neat and clean.

Commercial
We know that your company’s appearance leaves a lasting impression with your clients, and with the help of experienced painters, you can make it a great one. We understand that work must go on in the work place so we endeavour to work around your business schedule. We do this by painting one room at a time or scheduling weekend work to make sure your business is not disturbed.

No VOC (volatile organic compound) paints are used, keeping office air fresh and healthy for all employees. From start to finish, your commercial painting project will receive attention to detail that only experience can offer.
Back to Top


Exterior Painting
Proper preparation of any painting project is the ground work to ensuring a long-lasting, quality job. With this in mind, our painters will:

Thoroughly power wash entire exterior surface if requested, or the project requires it
Cover all landscaping, bushes, driveways and other non-painted areas as required
Seal all cracks in wood, brick or stucco to seal out moisture
Hard scrape to remove all loose and peeling paint
Light sand all scraped areas to take some of the edges off
Provide optional feather sanding, using power sanders and additional hand sanding which leaves no edges where the previous layers existed
High grade primers are applied to the thoroughly prepped areas to seal in bare spots. The Finish Coat is what seals the thoroughly prepped surface and is what gives the fresh look that you and your neighbours will admire. Top of the line Sherwin William, Homestead House and Benjamin Moore paints are typically used to ensure a quality, long lasting job. Even paint coverage is done to provide visual consistency.

Exterior painting serves two important functions:

Protect your investment. Nature’s elements, like UV rays, moisture and Canada’s gruelling winters take their toll on exposed brick and wood over time. It is much more cost effective to prepare the surface and re-paint than to have to replace the material. The second is to provide an aesthetically pleasing finish to your home.

Pride of ownership is evident in many neighbourhoods. The best way to achieve that is that have your biggest investment looking fresh and updated.
Back to Top


Pressure Washing
In addition to painting, we offer pressure washing, which is used for freshening the siding and decking of your property. Many types of mildew, mould and other foreign substances can grow on and around buildings. Pressure cleaning will revitalize siding and wood surfaces making them look new again. These are also used for preparing them for their new finish.

Pressure washing technology combines your household water with environmentally friendly cleansers designed not only to clean, but to deter future mildew growth. Our cleansers are biodegradable and safe around gardens and trees.

This cleaning will be followed by a high pressure rinse to remove the detergents and any remaining dirt, mold, mildew, and peeling paint.

profile:
Thanks for visiting Pretty Painting. My name is Roger LeBlanc and I have been painting for 20 years. I take pride in my work and my ability to get the job done without compromising on it's quality. I have been growing due to word of mouth, and that has truly been an honour for me. I started this business because I love to paint, but more importantly, I wanted to charge people a fair price. I think that price inflation is infiltrating everything around us, and even though I am just one person, I want to be that one person that did what was right by those around me. My prices will never be more than they need to be. That will be my motivation for as long as I get to run my own business.
20 years of doing an honorable service is not enough, I hope to do it for 40 more.                                                                    -Roger LeBlanc

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Pretty Painting is a company built on the integrity of one man, Roger Leblanc. He was determined to one day open up a business that would shake up the industry. He started working for his uncle when he was 15 years old, and he learned from his uncle that you could do the job right without over charging. 
As he moved on in his career, he worked for multiple large companies that had very different and even opposite views and morals to that of his uncle. These companies charged 2-3 times more than what was necessary or fair for the job. That is when Roger knew he would one day open up his own business and continue what he believed was right. He wanted to create a business built on honor and integrity, and make a proper living for his family, without feeling like he stole from his clients to do so.
Finally! Pretty Painting was born and the feedback has been overwhelming. It has been a humbling experience to see how emotional customers get when they see they didn't have to pay thousands of dollars more than what was necessary to get such a spectacular job done. A job done right IS NOT based on how much monetary incentive there is. It is based on the principles of the people who provide it. 
If you are wondering where you may find a job that will meet all of your expectations and not cost you more than what is reasonable, please contact us and give us the opportunity to give you a quote. You can take the time to compare it to other places and see that the same job can have very different prices!
It's Roger's goal that you see this for yourself and not be taken advantage of. 
The growth of Pretty Painting does not equate to a company becoming wealthy, but a company helping people keep more of the money they work so hard to earn! 

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Since our official company launch this year, we have had enormous support from our community. Our company goal is being well accepted which is to do the best possible quality job without charging those prices that come along with it. Our prices are fair, honorable and with a balance of not taking more from the customer than what is truly ethical and necessary. 
So we decided to take it a step further! if we are not the best price for the best job, then show us a quote from that cheaper registered company and we will not only match it, but we will take an additional 10% off!

profile:
The Concord Group began as a carpet cleaning company in 1983. As our business gained a reputation for quality and customer satisfaction, we began receiving requests for other services. Eventually the volume of requests led us to expand to renovations, interior and exterior decor, painting, electrical, plumbing, and a number of other services.

The Concord Group has become a one-stop-shop for all your home and business needs. We began as a small family organization and although we have grown ten-fold throughout the years, we maintain our dedication to providing a friendly and courteous environment. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

We offer water and flood damage repair, waterproofing, mould removal, carpet cleaning, and home renovations and restoration. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

During the past twenty years we are proud to be known as the most dependable, innovative and skilled contractors in the industry. 
We have a wide range of experience and expertise in Residential, Retail and Commercial accounts. 
This comes as a result of the structured focus of our team in building lasting and beneficial relationships with our clients. 
We invite you to browse through our website. Should there be any interest in receiving an estimate, do not hesitate to contact us.

Quality Assurance isn't just our name it's also one of our highest achievable priorities that we stand by. 
Successful control over our contracts has always been an important part of our philosophy. 
Our approach to maintaining high standards of workmanship and to assure customer satisfaction, our customer retention rate is a key factor to our business successes. 
Quality controls are maintained by doing regular quality check points with our clients.

We start with a detailed analysis of each contract, collecting all pertinent data needed for the preparation of a realistic service 
proposal. Our knowledge of the assessed account enables us to prepare both Scheduling and Quality Assurance.

Give A Call - 905-955-5248

profile:
Starting in Toronto then based up north in Innisfil, Best Choice Painting & Contracting Company has been in business for 30 years handling large and small Residential, Commercial, Governmental and Industrial, projects. As a proud to be Canadian company, we have established ourselves through the principals of high quality standards, providing professional, knowledgeable workmanship along with reliable quality services to our clients in the Simcoe County, York, Blue Mountain the GTA and across Central Ontario.

Pricing & Quotes
Every project has a budget!
Granting discount prices on quality materials with competitive pricing, Best Choice is affiliated with many company brand names. We take each clients project budget into account while understanding the clients interests and project needs in obtaining the best results possible. Our skilled staff can provide knowledgeable insight on what is required in achieving this goal which can save you money now and in the future with Long Lasting Results!

Our Team
Skilled and hardworking, the Best Choice team is always striving to do it’s best in keeping our new customers and previous clients happy. Knowing every client is an important one, we will exceed expectations, a happy client is a repeat customer that creates new clients. Our team coordinates have years of experience specializing in all different areas of Painting, Renovation and Maintenance, providing knowledgeable, professional and experienced insight, to any given project.

Our Clients
Honoring our clients needs and wants is a priority and in return we have benefited by establishing a growing, successful business that will continue in providing complete satisfaction to every Valued Client!

To Our Respected Clients!
Building Owners, Retail & Restaurant Owners, Office Managers, Property Managers, General Contractors, Real Estate Agents and Residential Clients.

We Thank You!
Blue Mountain Resort
Waterford Retirement Residence
Loblaw Inc.
King Township
Mapleview Dentistry
Home Hardware
Retail & Restaurant Business
Georgina Township
Pro Guard Management
Ministry Of Tourism & Culture
Community Hockey Arenas, Church’s & Schools
Briar Hill Residents

And to every Residential client we have had the pleasure to service!
We would not be here without You!

Safety
Our work is conducted in a safe and conscientious manner. Safety issues are discussed and promoted upon for each project and for your peace of mind and protection, Best Choice is Insured.

Visit us at www.best-choice.ca
